verses.verse: And this is the thing <WH1697> that thou shalt do <WH6213> unto them to hallow <WH6942> them <WH3547>, to minister unto me in the priest's office: take <WH3947> one <WH259> young <WH1121> bullock <WH6499> and two <WH8147> rams <WH352> without blemish <WH8549>,

and unleavened <WH4682> bread <WH3899>, and cakes <WH2471> unleavened <WH4682> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, and wafers <WH7550> unleavened <WH4682> anointed <WH4886> with oil <WH8081>: of fine wheaten <WH2406> flour <WH5560> shalt thou make them <WH6213>.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> them into one <WH259> basket <WH5536>, and bring <WH7126> them in the basket <WH5536>, with the bullock <WH6499> and the two <WH8147> rams <WH352>.
And Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> thou shalt bring <WH7126> unto the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, and shalt wash <WH7364> them with water <WH4325>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> the garments <WH899>, and put <WH3847> upon Aaron <WH175> the coat <WH3801>, and the robe <WH4598> of the ephod <WH646>, and the ephod <WH646>, and the breastplate <WH2833>, and gird <WH640> him with the skilfully woven band <WH2805> of the ephod <WH646>;
and thou shalt set <WH7760> the mitre <WH4701> upon his head <WH7218>, and put <WH5414> the holy <WH6944> crown <WH5145> upon the mitre <WH4701>.
Then shalt thou take <WH3947> the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and pour <WH3332> it upon his head <WH7218>, and anoint him <WH4886>.
And thou shalt bring <WH7126> his sons <WH1121>, and put <WH3847> coats upon them <WH3801>.

And thou shalt gird <WH2296> them with girdles <WH73>, Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, and bind <WH2280> head-tires <WH4021> on them <WH3550>: and they shall have the priesthood by a perpetual <WH5769> statute <WH2708>: and thou shalt consecrate <WH4390> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>.

And thou shalt bring <WH7126> the bullock <WH6499> before <WH6440> the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>: and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall lay <WH5564> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the bullock <WH6499>.
And thou shalt kill <WH7819> the bullock <WH6499> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> of the blood <WH1818> of the bullock <WH6499>, and put <WH5414> it upon the horns <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> with thy finger <WH676>; and thou shalt pour <WH8210> out all the blood <WH1818> at <WH413> the base <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> all the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> the inwards <WH7130>, and the caul <WH3508> upon the liver <WH3516>, and the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and the fat <WH2459> that is upon them <WH6999>, and burn them upon the altar <WH4196>.

But the flesh <WH1320> of the bullock <WH6499>, and its skin <WH5785>, and its dung <WH6569>, shalt thou burn <WH8313> with fire <WH784> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>: it is a sin-offering <WH2403>.
Thou shalt also take <WH3947> the one <WH259> ram <WH352>; and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall lay <WH5564> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the ram <WH352>.
And thou shalt slay <WH7819> the ram <WH352>, and thou shalt take <WH3947> its blood <WH1818>, and sprinkle <WH2236> it round about <WH5439> upon the altar <WH4196>.

And thou shalt cut <WH5408> the ram <WH352> into its pieces <WH5409>, and wash <WH7364> its inwards <WH7130>, and its legs <WH3767>, and put <WH5414> them with its pieces <WH5409>, and with its head <WH7218>.

And thou shalt burn <WH6999> the whole ram <WH352> upon the altar <WH4196>: it is a burnt-offering <WH5930> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; it is a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381>, an offering made by fire <WH801> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.
And thou shalt take <WH3947> the other <WH8145> ram <WH352>; and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall lay <WH5564> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the ram <WH352>.

Then shalt thou kill <WH7819> the ram <WH352>, and take <WH3947> of its blood <WH1818>, and put <WH5414> it upon the tip <WH8571> of the right ear <WH241> of Aaron <WH175>, and upon the tip <WH8571> of the right <WH3233> ear <WH241> of his sons <WH1121>, and upon the thumb <WH931> of their right <WH3233> hand <WH3027>, and upon the great toe <WH931> of their right <WH3233> foot <WH7272>, and sprinkle <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> upon the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> of the blood <WH1818> that is upon the altar <WH4196>, and of the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and sprinkle <WH5137> it upon Aaron <WH175>, and upon his garments <WH899>, and upon his sons <WH1121>, and upon the garments <WH899> of his sons <WH1121> with him <WH6942>: and he shall be hallowed, and his garments <WH899>, and his sons <WH1121>, and his sons <WH1121>' garments with him <WH899>.

Also thou shalt take <WH3947> of the ram <WH352> the fat <WH2459>, and the fat tail <WH451>, and the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> the inwards <WH7130>, and the caul <WH3508> of the liver <WH3516>, and the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and the fat <WH2459> that is upon them <WH3225>, and the right thigh <WH7785> (for it is a ram <WH352> of consecration <WH4394>),

and one <WH259> loaf <WH3603> of bread <WH3899>, and one <WH259> cake <WH2471> of oiled <WH8081> bread <WH259>, and one wafer <WH7550>, out of the basket <WH5536> of unleavened bread <WH4682> that is before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>:

and thou shalt put <WH7760> the whole upon the hands <WH3709> of Aaron <WH175>, and upon the hands <WH3709> of his sons <WH1121>, and shalt wave <WH5130> them for a wave-offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> them from their hands <WH3027>, and burn <WH6999> them on the altar <WH4196> upon the burnt-offering <WH5930>, for a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>: it is an offering made by fire <WH801> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> the breast <WH2373> of Aaron <WH175>'s ram <WH352> of consecration <WH4394>, and wave <WH5130> it for a wave-offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>: and it shall be thy portion <WH4490>.

And thou shalt sanctify <WH6942> the breast <WH2373> of the wave-offering <WH8573>, and the thigh <WH7785> of the heave-offering <WH8641>, which is waved <WH5130>, and which is heaved up <WH7311>, of the ram <WH352> of consecration <WH4394>, even of that which <WH834> is for Aaron <WH175>, and of that which is for his sons <WH1121>:

and it shall be for Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> as their portion <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> from the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; for it is a heave-offering <WH8641>: and it shall be a heave-offering <WH8641> from the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> of the sacrifices <WH2077> of their peace-offerings <WH8002>, even their heave-offering <WH8641> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.
And the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> of Aaron <WH175> shall be for his sons <WH1121> after <WH310> him <WH4888>, to be anointed in them <WH4390>, and to be consecrated in them.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall the son <WH1121> that is priest <WH3548> in his stead put <WH3847> them on <WH935>, when he cometh into the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> to minister <WH8334> in the holy place <WH6944>.
And thou shalt take <WH3947> the ram <WH352> of consecration <WH4394>, and boil <WH1310> its flesh <WH1320> in a holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>.

And Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> of the ram <WH352>, and the bread <WH3899> that is in the basket <WH5536>, at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>.

And they shall eat <WH398> those things wherewith atonement was made <WH3722>, to consecrate <WH4390> and to sanctify <WH6942> them <WH2114>: but a stranger shall not eat <WH398> thereof <WH6944>, because they are holy.

And if aught of the flesh <WH1320> of the consecration <WH4394>, or of the bread <WH3899>, remain <WH3498> unto the morning <WH1242>, then thou shalt burn <WH8313> the remainder <WH3498> with fire <WH784>: it shall not be eaten <WH398>, because it is holy <WH6944>.
And thus shalt thou do <WH6213> unto Aaron <WH175>, and to his sons <WH1121>, according to all that I have commanded <WH6680> thee <WH7651>: seven days <WH3117> shalt thou consecrate them <WH4390>.

And every day <WH3117> shalt thou offer <WH6213> the bullock <WH6499> of sin-offering <WH2403> for atonement <WH3725>: and thou shalt cleanse <WH2398> the altar <WH4196>, when thou makest atonement <WH3722> for it <WH4886>; and thou shalt anoint it <WH6942>, to sanctify it.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> thou shalt make atonement <WH3722> for the altar <WH4196>, and sanctify <WH6942> it <WH4196>: and the altar shall be most holy <WH6944>; whatsoever toucheth <WH5060> the altar <WH4196> shall be holy <WH6944>.
Now this is that which thou shalt offer <WH6213> upon the altar <WH4196>: two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old day <WH3117> by day <WH3117> continually <WH8548>.
The one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> in the morning <WH1242>; and the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> at even <WH6153>:

and with the one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> a tenth <WH6241> part of an ephah of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with the fourth part <WH7253> of a hin <WH1969> of beaten <WH3795> oil <WH8081>; and the fourth part <WH7243> of a hin <WH1969> of wine <WH3196> for a drink-offering <WH5262>.

And the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> at even <WH6153>, and shalt do <WH6213> thereto according to the meal-offering <WH4503> of the morning <WH1242>, and according to the drink-offering <WH5262> thereof <WH5207>, for a sweet savor <WH7381>, an offering made by fire <WH801> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

It shall be a continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930> throughout your generations <WH1755> at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, where I will meet <WH3259> with you <WH1696>, to speak there unto thee.
And there I will meet <WH3259> with the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and the Tent shall be sanctified <WH6942> by my glory <WH3519>.

And I will sanctify <WH6942> the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, and the altar <WH4196>: Aaron <WH175> also and his sons <WH1121> will I sanctify <WH6942>, to minister to me in the priest <WH3547>'s office.
And I will dwell <WH7931> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and will be their God <WH430>.

And they shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068> their God <WH430>, that brought them forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, that I might dwell <WH7931> among <WH8432> them <WH3068>: I am Jehovah their God <WH430>.
